00001 #ifndef _MSGBOX_H
00002 #define _MSGBOX_H
00003 
00004 // Message box flags
00005 #define           MSG_BOX_FLAG_USE_CENTERING_RECT                 0x0001                  // Pass in a rect to center in
00006 #define   MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK                                                                 0x0002                  // Displays OK button
00007 #define   MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO                                                  0x0004                  // Displays YES NO buttons
00008 #define   MSG_BOX_FLAG_CANCEL                                                 0x0008                  // Displays YES NO buttons
00009 #define           MSG_BOX_FLAG_FOUR_NUMBERED_BUTTONS  0x0010                  // Displays four numbered buttons, 1-4
00010 #define   MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNOCONTRACT                              0x0020      // yes no and contract buttons
00011 #define           MSG_BOX_FLAG_OKCONTRACT                                     0x0040                  // ok and contract buttons
00012 #define           MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNOLIE                                             0x0080                  // ok and contract buttons
00013 #define           MSG_BOX_FLAG_CONTINUESTOP                                   0x0100                  // continue stop box
00014 #define           MSG_BOX_FLAG_OKSKIP                                                     0x0200                  // Displays ok or skip (meanwhile) buttons
00015 #define           MSG_BOX_FLAG_GENERICCONTRACT                    0x0400                  // displays contract buttoin + 2 user-defined text buttons
00016 #define           MSG_BOX_FLAG_GENERIC                                              0x0800                  // 2 user-defined text buttons
00017 
00018 // message box return codes
00019 #define           MSG_BOX_RETURN_OK                                                 1                             // ENTER or on OK button
00020 #define           MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES                                                2                             // ENTER or YES button
00021 #define           MSG_BOX_RETURN_NO                                                 3                             // ESC, Right Click or NO button
00022 #define           MSG_BOX_RETURN_CONTRACT                               4                             // contract button
00023 #define           MSG_BOX_RETURN_LIE                                                5                             // LIE BUTTON
00024 
00025 // message box style flags
00026 enum
00027 {
00028       MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE = 0,                                                                                    // We'll have other styles, like in laptop, etc
00029                                                                                                                                                                   // Graphics are all that are required here...
00030       MSG_BOX_RED_ON_WHITE,
00031       MSG_BOX_BLUE_ON_GREY,
00032       MSG_BOX_BASIC_SMALL_BUTTONS,
00033       MSG_BOX_IMP_STYLE,
00034       MSG_BOX_LAPTOP_DEFAULT,
00035 };

00083 ////////////////////////////////
00084 // ubStyle:                   Determines the look of graphics including buttons
00085 // zString:                   16-bit string
00086 // uiExitScreen         The screen to exit to
00087 // ubFlags                    Some flags for button style
00088 // ReturnCallback Callback for return. Can be NULL. Returns any above return value
00089 // pCenteringRect Rect to send if MSG_BOX_FLAG_USE_CENTERING_RECT set. Can be NULL 
00090 ////////////////////////////////
